targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "autogen"."l7_client.avg_ssl_handshakes_new" WHERE ("avicontroller" =~ /^$device$/ AND "environment" =~ /^$environment$/ AND "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "metric_type" = 'virtualservice_metrics') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "autogen"."l7_client.avg_ssl_handshakes_new" WHERE ("avicontroller" =~ /^$device$/ AND "environment" =~ /^$environment$/ AND "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "metric_type" = 'virtualservice_metrics') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "autogen"."controller_stats.avg_mem_usage" WHERE ("avicontroller" =~ /^$device$/ AND "environment" =~ /^$environment$/ AND "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "metric_type" = 'controller_metrics') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cluster_node" fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "autogen"."controller_stats.avg_mem_usage" WHERE ("avicontroller" =~ /^$device$/ AND "environment" =~ /^$environment$/ AND "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "metric_type" = 'controller_metrics') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cluster_node" fill(null)

list.name: environment
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "environment" WHERE location =~ /$location/

list.name: device
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "avicontroller" WHERE location =~ /$location/ AND environment =~ /$environment/
